About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a 21-year-old IT student at LUT University. I am currently in the bachelor's degree phase, but I plan to complete a master's degree and graduate with a master's degree in information technology. During my studies, I have gained experience in e.g. creating databases with SQL, editing databases with the PHP programming language, coding Java, python and C and creating HTML webpages. In addition, I have experience in game development with the Unity game engine. Due to my experience in customer service, I get along easily with people and help others in decision making.

Biltema

Customer Service

I have worked in Biltema in customer service desk for one summer. My duties included making product returns and complaints, helping and guiding the customers, logistics and solving product problems.

Unity game project

I have worked on a game called Spaceball in Unity as a group project in school and I have gained lots of experience in game development along the way in e.g. user interface, animations, sprites, scripts and databases. The link to the game is on my work page.
